==Walkthrough==
# Move forward, then turn right to start a cut scene.
# Turn right into the next area.
# Defeat the enemies to unlock an '''Exquisite Chest''' and the door. {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Kikouban;Nobushi: Jintouban;Kairagi: Fiery Might}}
# Enter the room and use the elevator on the right to go down. {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Scout*2}}
# Go forward and jump down into the room on the left.
# Defeat the enemies to unlock an '''Exquisite Chest'''. {{Enemy List|Kairagi: Fiery Might;Kairagi: Dancing Thunder}}
# Use the nearby elevator to go up.
# Go forward and glide up with the wind current.
# Move the first sliding door.
# Move the second sliding door.
# Defeat the enemies to unlock a '''Common Chest'''. {{Enemy List|Kairagi: Fiery Might*1}}
# Go back and move the first sliding door.
# Go forward and move the third sliding door. {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Scout*2;Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger;Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist}}
# Destroy the 2 boxes on the left and right sides to unblock the sliding doors.
# Facing the previous Treasure Hoarders, move the sliding door on the right.
# Go into the room and move the sliding door on the right.
#* There is a '''Common Chest''' in this room.
# Facing the previous Treasure Hoarders, move the sliding door on the left.
#* There is a '''Common Chest''' in this room.
# Use the elevator to go down.
# Jump down into the room.
# Go towards the open door and use the lever to bring down the nearby lamp.
# Activate all 4 lamps in the room with [[Electro]] attacks.
# Go to the middle of the room to start a cut scene.
#* There is a '''Precious Chest''' before the exit.

==Chests==
The following chests can be found in the domain
* 3x [[Common Chest]]
* 2x [[Exquisite Chest]]
* 1x [[Precious Chest]]
